snippet.title: EXOcars — Gameplay Snippet
snippet.description:
We’re happy to share the EXOcars gameplay snippet!🚀🎉

Our game is based on real car physics, ensuring a unique driving experience with each race. Suspension dynamics and track surface interaction make every race unpredictable.

Add to wishlist 👉🏻 https://store.steampowered.com/app/2898310/EXOcars/

EXOcars will launch on VR (Meta Quest, Steam, Pico, PSVR2), and this time you will also be able to enjoy the game on PC and SteamDeck🔥 

Whether you're carving through the wilderness or tearing up the asphalt, our racing game promises an unparalleled experience that will keep you coming back for more 🏎️

Are you ready to take on the challenge? 💥

#VR #racing #game #gamedev #gameplay #car #driving
